value:
I buried the knights of Leonster in the
Aed desert and finally had everything
I wanted...until Grannvale interfered.$k$pI will never forget the disgrace, the
aggravation. Utterly infuriating.

Thracia is a land of stark mountains.
We raise wyverns and warriors, but...
our harvests cannot satisfy them.

Wyverns are quite clever. They can
recognize their master and obey. The
same cannot be said of all people...

You view our positions on the field as
if looking down from sky? Incredible.
I see now how valuable you are...

A Thracian king must be strong.
As such, I must keep training, to
build and display my strength.

Hmm... I see that fire in your eyes.
You cannot conceal your aspirations
from me, $Nu!

Etch the pride and will of Thracia
upon your mind... And alongside it,
the name Travant!

Looking down on the wyvern knights
of Thracia would be a grave mistake.
Argh! Intolerable!
You shall get no gratitude from me.

I am Travant, King Thracia. Prepare to
witness the unmatched spearwork of
a wyvern knight!

The people of the Thracian peninsula,
despite all that has happened, have
dreamt of unification for many years.$k$pFinally, their dream is reality! ...Yet,
a certain brat from Leonster refuses
to fall in line.$k$pBut the difference between us lies in
our abilities to lead... And whether we
can make manifest our desires.$k$pI command my people with strength.
He relies on the trust of weaklings.
I will crush him before too long.$k$pIf you aspire to lead, you would do
well to keep these truths at top of
mind... Take that however you will.
はあっ
Die!
ぐっ…
You...!
Your end draws nigh.
Victory's within reach!
Craven fools!
You'll be the first to falter!
Thracia...my home...
Evilish laugh
Remember well the name of Travant...he who will see you swallowed by the afterlife!
...What are you doing, clown.
To unify Thracia is my life's work. We need that fertile, northern land.
My people are despised as hyenas by the very countries that force us to feed ourselves on battle.
The mother was my enemy first...now even the daughter despises me. The blood on my hands, and the blood in her veins...are the same.
Let my people be tormented no longer. That is my only wish.
I will lend you my strength only if it is a boon to my people. You will not have me just for your own selfish benefit.
Mercy is a luxury.
Absurd...
Leave none alive!
